reviews.text: We stayed in Prague one week in August 2006. We liked this managed appartment hotel very much.
reviews.title: Nice, comfortable - next time again!
Fantastic hotel at a great price
reviews.text: You have breakfast in room, just call reception and 5 minutes later a lady brings two baskets with coffee, cheese sausage, marmelade, juice. Only choice of coffe or tea, but good food!
The house is a old house and in good situation.
reviews.title: Good hotel in excellent location!

reviews.text: You can go by foot to Karls bridge and the city center or use tram.
reviews.title: Perfect
Excellent Value!
reviews.text: It is a quiet surrounding, not much noise! A small park is directly in front of the hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Top floor apartment has a roof window which you cannot close in the living room, so if you sleep there you will wake up early in the morning... However it is a very good apartment, clean, big bathroom with bidet, friendly staff, good position, quite during night.
reviews.title: Nice apartment!

reviews.text: First the bad news! I booked an apartment via [--] and was given as my hotel 'VK Apartments at Janska 7. (I found this on the map and was happy with the location) It then turned out that this was a lower level agency that allocated me to Artesse Apartments - without any notification what so ever. The location of these apartments is not as good and had I known where they were I would not have accepted the offer of the booking. You can see from the following information that it is not a 'central location'.
reviews.title: A Step Too Far!

likes.liked: — The bathroom was modern, had a bath as well as a shower, lots of hot water.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Loved this hotel!

likes.liked: — Great location, very comfy room and good breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Great value , clean and good location
